participant_abstract.sent: This was the first meeting of the project team and we spent it in getting to know each other and testing the equipment - in particular the white board.
The overall aim of the project was discussed (to design a TV remote control) and the project leader gave us some costing information.

participant_actions.sent: ID (me) - I've been rereading the project announcement doc to remind myself of the methodology, and which tasks are for me.
Next: working design aspect of functional design phase.
I guess the ME should be working on the requirements spec; the UID on the technical functions of the remote.

participant_decisions.sent: At this initial meeting, the decisions made were not explicit, except that we agreed the roles that the ME, UID and ID should take.

participant_problems.sent: I think we rushed this meeting a bit, probably because we were all uncertain of the task expected of us.
At this stage I'm somewhat vague about what tasks I'm supposed to be carrying out.
